name: Dinosaur Name Generator
description: Roar into the prehistoric past and discover your inner dinosaur! Unleash your dino-mite alter ego with our awesome Dinosaur Name Generator! Find the perfect name that embodies your strength, ferocity, or perhaps your surprising cuddliness (even T-Rexes need hugs!).
introduction: Ever wondered what you'd be called if you were a dinosaur? Well, wonder no more! Our Dinosaur Name Generator combines cool prefixes and suffixes to create unique and hilarious dinosaur names. Get ready to stomp around with your new, totally rad dino identity!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button – no time machine required!
Behold! A magnificent dinosaur name will be revealed!
Not feeling the dino-love? Click 'Generate' again for a fresh, fearsome moniker.
Share your awesome dinosaur name with your friends and family. Prepare for envy!
Optional: Practice your best dinosaur roar. It's highly encouraged.

faqs.question: Is this generator scientifically accurate?
faqs.answer: While we strive for fun and creativity, scientific accuracy may have taken a vacation. Think of it as more 'Jurassic Park' than 'paleontology textbook'.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my pet lizard?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Your lizard will thank you for bestowing upon it a name of such prehistoric grandeur. Just don't expect it to start building nests.

faqs.question: Are the names generated actually real dinosaur names?
faqs.answer: Some might sound like real dinosaur names, but most are creatively crafted combinations. We're aiming for cool, not necessarily factual. Though, who knows, maybe we'll discover a 'Sparklesaurus' someday!

faqs.question: What if I don't like the name I get?
faqs.answer: No worries! Just hit that 'Generate' button again! We have a whole Mesozoic Era's worth of names waiting to be discovered.

faqs.question: Can I suggest prefixes or suffixes for the generator?
faqs.answer: We'd love to hear your ideas! Send them our way, and who knows, your suggestion might just become the next big thing in dinosaur naming!

faqs.question: Is this generator free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is completely free to use. Enjoy your journey into the prehistoric world of names!
